{{cpp/utility/bitset/title|1=operator==|2=operator!=}}
{{cpp/utility/bitset/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcla|num=1|noexcept=c++11|constexpr=c++23|1=
bool operator==( const bitset&amp; rhs ) const;
}}
{{dcla|num=2|noexcept=c++11|until=c++20|1=
bool operator!=( const bitset&amp; rhs ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Returns true if all of the bits in {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}} are equal.

@2@ Returns true if any of the bits in {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}} are not equal.

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|bitset to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if the value of each bit in {{c|*this}} equals the value of the corresponding bit in {{c|rhs}}, otherwise {{c|false}}.

@2@ {{c|true}} if {{c|1=!(*this == rhs)}}, otherwise {{c|false}}.

===Example===
{{example
|Compare given bitsets to determine if they are identical:
|code=
#include &lt;bitset&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; b1(0b0011);
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; b2(b1);
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; b3(0b0100);

    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 == b2: " &lt;&lt; (b1 == b2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 == b3: " &lt;&lt; (b1 == b3) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "b1 != b3: " &lt;&lt; (b1 != b3) &lt;&lt; '\n';

//  b1 == std::bitset&lt;3&gt;{}; // compile-time error: incompatible types
}
|output=
b1 == b2: true
b1 == b3: false
b1 != b3: true
}}
